metadata.title: Standard Brass Grill Scraper and Handle Combo - Individually Packed - Mens Gifts for Christmas
features: Handle Bundle (Includes 1 Brass Grill Scraper & 1 Long Aluminum Handle) - Clean your grill while it is still hot! You can now keep your cooking surface pristine while grilling.

Works With Most Grill Grates - 2 in 1 grill gadget includes 3 grooves for round grates and 1 groove for V-shaped grates. Use it to clean Char-Broil, Char-Griller, Traeger, Coleman, Kamado Joe, Smoke Hollow, Holland and many others.

Won't Damage Your Grill - Made of Solid Brass, which makes these heavy-duty barbecue tools last for years and years. At the same time, it's 100% Safe To Use use on Porcelain and Teflon-coated grill grates.
Versatile - Its Compact Size lets you stash this bar b que tool in your pocket, backpack or glove box. Pair it with our Optional Long Handle to clean hot grills and get leverage for stubborn grime.
Easy to Clean - Dishwasher Safe, you can even just use soapy water to clean, and dry with a paper towel.
description: S4430 with Long Handle | Individually Packaged | Size: S4430 | Scraper Material: Brass | Handle Material: Aluminum Get your BBQ grate clean as a whistle - without dangerous stray wire bristles. These 2 in 1 BBQ cleaning tools work with most grills & is a safe, effective way to prep your grill for your next BBQ. Rusty, filthy grill grates can lead to foul-tasting & potentially contaminated food. But Wire Brushes Can Shed Their Bristles, which can then wind up in your meat. So, what’s the solution? It’s the 2 in 1 Sage Owl Grill Cleaner in Brass. This BBQ grill tool Works With Most Any Design, Brand, & Style Of Grill, featuring 3 notches for round grates & 1 notch for V-shaped grates. The solid aluminum handles outlast handle with wood or rubber coatings. When exposed to the weather, wood will dry and crack. The rubber coatings will dry and split. The anodized aluminum will look as good as new after years of exposure. ►Top rated ►Bristle-free - safer than a wire brush ►Heavy-duty brass construction lasts longer than wooden cleaners ►Small size lets you take anywhere ►Includes hanging accessories - hook and chain Unlike other cleaners that can scratch and damage delicate grill surfaces, the 2 in 1 Sage Owl Grill Cleaner in Brass by The Sage Owl is 100% Safe To Use on Porcelain and Teflon-coated grills. Fits A Wide Variety Of Grills: ►Charcoal ►Propane ►Porcelain ►Infrared ►Kamado ►Gas ►Electric ►Ceramic ►Wood Pellet ►Smoker ►Indoor Oven and Range Improved with an Extended Handle: ► With the handle, you can clean your grill while it is still hot and the grease is soft. ► Now you're able to give your grill a quick cleaning while grilling. Great as mens gift ideas, or as stocking stuffers men.
